Dialogue.Page: Mod: Outer Wilds Mod Loader Authors: Alek and friends
The backbone of all other mods, OWML is the software responsible for making the code written by modders actually affect the game.
Not only does OWML allow mods to interface with the game on a basic level, it also provides a number of handy helpers to mod developers, giving them easier ways to influence the game.
